VEHICLE WILL LUNGE AND JERK WHILE BACKING OR UNDER BRAKING.  ENGINE WILL REV AND THEN STALL AS WELL.  CHECK ENGINE LIGHT WITH COME ON OR IT WILL GO INTO "FAIL-SAFE" MODE.  TOOK IT TO A LOCAL FORD DEALERSHIP AND THEY ADVISED IT NEEDED A NEW THROTTLE BODY.

AT SLOW SPEEDS, AT VARIOUS TIMES, THERE ARE UNINTENDED SURGES IN SPEED.    THEY ARE USUALLY MORE COMMON WHEN THE AIR CONDITIONING IS IN USE.    THE MAY OCCUR WHEN IN FORWARD OR REVERSE.    MY LOCAL DEALER ADVISED THAT FORD WAS LOOKING INTO THE PROBLEM, BU

LEAKS WATER FROM WET WEATHER INTO VEHICLE'S CARGO AREA AND FRONT PASSENGER FLOOR AREA. FREEZING TO SUB-FREEZING TEMPS CAUSE WATER TO FREEZE CARPET AND ANYTHING IN CAR WITH MOISTURE ON IT.  FIRST TIME THIS WAS APPARENT, CAR WAS IN FOR RECALL ON DOOR LATCHE
